column4: for some reason virtualbox can't see any of the folders i share to it. and i have guest tools installed.
I try to go to \\vboxsvr and it says it can't find it. I try looking in network places, but it can't find anything
What -exact operating system- are you running as a Guest?
okay, not Vista, so not the User Access Control problem
where x is an available drive, and share is the name of the share, yes
you do have to have network connection, and NAT is the easiest to set up
I have NAT chosen, and the guest has internet access
however, it can't ping my host by it's normal IP
does the host have a special IP inside the guest?
I haven't set up anything besides that
so do you have any idea why xp can't join the normal network then? what workgroup should the guest be under?
I haven't used Windows for quite a while, and I'm not even sure changing workgroups does anything
